content.body: As a beginner I experiment with fetch() in chrome console. the command is const req = await fetch("https://swapi.dev/api/people/");  on some page it is work on some others doesn't. It is because the cors, I would like to know how a page could enable this cors functionality?

It is because the cors, I would like to know how a page could enable this cors functionality?
